title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) User Training Protocol Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational neuroscience, digital device utilization experience, and basic EEG signal processing concepts
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the operational principles of BCI systems and human-machine interaction mechanisms.
Acquire stable EEG pattern generation skills through directive design-based training.
Conduct the design and validation process of BCI training protocols through team projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
